name: Robot City (itch)
description:
You are a robot, and other robots want to kill you! Choose a weapon and go fight your enemies!
You are in a city and you have a jet pack, so don't hesitate to gain height to surprise other players, but watch your fuel.

The game does not have a dedicated server, so it's only possible to play locally at the moment. You can create a local server at the start of the game, and then other players can join you!

Controls :

  • Movements : Arrows / ZQSD
  • Jet pack : Space Bar
  • Pause : Escape
  • Swap weapon : Scroll wheel
